name: NSPopover.Behavior
desc: The appearance and disappearance behavior of a popover.

items.name: case applicationDefined
items.desc: Your application assumes responsibility for closing the popover.

items.name: case transient
items.desc: The system will close the popover when the user interacts with a user interface element outside the popover.

items.name: case semitransient
items.desc: The system will close the popover when the user interacts with user interface elements in the window containing the popover's positioning view.
